            <entry>cahi1:data_42fef6c04c81cb6cef4d2fae85dc87396cd6c1fd</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Particle model of matter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Partikelmodell des Stoffes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Modèle de particules de matière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Modelo da partícula da matéria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Modello della particella della materia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μοντέλο μορίων του θέματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Modelo de la partícula de la materia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is the third of three illustrations showing the representation of the particle model of the three states of matter.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">states of matter</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist der Third von drei Abbildungen, welche 
die Darstellung des Partikelmodells der drei Zustände des Stoffes 
zeigen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est le tiers de trois illustrations montrant la 
représentation du modèle de particules des trois états de matière.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é o third de três ilustrações que mostram
a respresentação do modelo da partícula dos três estados da 
matéria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è il terzo di tre illustrazioni che mostrano
che la rappresentazione del modello della particella dei tre 
dichiara della materia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι το τρίτο τριών απεικονίσεων που 
εμφανίζουν την αντιπροσώπευση του μοντέλου μορίων των τριών 
καταστάσεων του θέματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es el tercero de tres ilustraciones que 
muestran la representación del modelo de la partícula de los tres 
estados de la materia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zustände des Stoffes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">états de matière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estados da matéria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dichiara della materia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καταστάσεις του θέματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estados de la materia</string>
          </keyword>
